TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {215919=© Copyright 2014 Harvard University All Rights Reserved, 68226=Background: Two-time captain, four-year letterwinner in football at Colonial where he started at linebacker and tight end ... As a sophomore helped lead Colonial to an undefeated season and S.D. Central League championship ... Led the Colonial's to the CIF semifinals as a junior ... As a senior named National Football Foundation Most Valuable Player and All-League ... Recipient of the ISF Sportsmanship Award in 2012 ... Two-time second team All-League tight end ... Finished his career with 1,631 total yards, 169 tackles and 16 touchdowns ... Also a four-year letterwinner in baseball and three-year letterwinner in basketball ... In 2012 named AP Scholar with distinction ... Recipient of the Harvard Prize Book Award in 2012 and Governor's School Interdisciplinary Award in 2010 ... Member of the National Honor Society ... His mother, Carol, played basketball and ran track and field at Moravian. }
